title: Please Help, not familiar with fonts whatsoever - Script and serif styles
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317101245im_/http:/typophile.com/files/A_3667.jpg)

Can you guys please identify all the fonts in the image please my fiancé and i would really appreciate it.

Thanks guys

Font: 

 Carolyna Pro 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317101245/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")
author: Yevdjus

comments.content:
Carolyna Pro Black  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/carolyna-pro-black/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317101245/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/carolyna-pro-black/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/carolyna-pro-black/")

The M is an alternate character of it.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/carolyna-pro-black/regular/glyph...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317101245/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/carolyna-pro-black/regular/glyphs/547565/285 "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/carolyna-pro-black/regular/glyphs/547565/285")

Menu is [Carolyna Pro Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317101245/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/carolyna-pro-black/).

Edit: Never mind ... oh - it has been further italicized manually.

The lines under Salad are too small.
